attributes.title: Unbelievable I’m ashamed to be from the us
attributes.review: After I downloaded the app it uninstalled itself saying “ERROR: This app is for Americans only. Please visit settings to update language and region to United States as for this app is not available for aliens.”

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: This app absolutely is horrible took  a week to download and took up all of my storage it also wiped out all of my other apps i would give it a 0 star rating if i could

attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review: This app hacked my phone and shut it off when I opened it it automatically gave my vote to trump and as a legal colored man in the US I feel that I have been robbed of my rights and demand my vote back from that cheating politician that gets his votes illegally

attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY HORRIBLE!!!!!!!
attributes.review: This app made my phone crash more than once !!!! I have to go get a new phone now because my phone isn’t working I am typing this on my iPad. Do not download this app unless you want your phone to blow up !!!

attributes.title: HORRIBBLE APP!!!!😡
attributes.review: i got this app to support our beautiful president donald trump😢😢but it kept on breaking down!!!! it even started messing with my info on my phone!!!  it kept glitching and saying rude things towards our president and i was sHOCKED at how bad this app is. do NOT download this app, it is gross😡😡😡😡

attributes.title: Cursed
attributes.review: This app messes your head. It stole my McDonald food which I haded to waste my money again. I 100% agree that this app is cursed it gives you the worst nightmares once you open it. I say take this app down before it damages more peolpe.

attributes.title: RUINED MY LIFE
attributes.review: Ever since downloading this app Starbucks and McDonald’s having been appearing at every block with a army of Karen’s and kenneths in trucks with confederate flags, when I opened it I heard a chanting of tongues and then suddenly my ancestors were flying around the room in demonic shape with maga hats on

attributes.title: This app ruined my life
attributes.review: I hated this app so much. It affected my family life and I am drifting away from my family because of it. You caused my brother to completely abandon all of us. And there were to many ads

attributes.title: Why would anyone get this
attributes.review: This literally ruined my software, so cheaply made! I had to go get my phone repaired! It glitches everything and my screen was frozen on this awful image of a pedo with dementia😵💀

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: I DO NOT recommend this app it’s terrible. It uses your location even when your not on the app for god knows what that want you location for. Wouldn’t get if I were you
